item.title: Engineering an Electroactive Bacterial Cellulose-Carbon Nanotube Composite Membrane Against Staphylococcus aureus
item.description:

No abstract
item.author: Daniel L. Levin, Camila S. Cué-Royo, Denis Johnson, Soumalya Gosh, Sricharani Rao Balmuri, Huda Usman, Shakira M. Martinez-Vasquez, David Kumar Yesudoss, Abdoulaye Djire, Mostafa Bedewy, Tagbo H. R. Niepa

item.title: A diagonal volatility basis set to assess the condensation of organic vapors onto particles
item.description:
Brandon Lopez, Nirvan Bhattacharyya, Jenna DeVivo, Mingyi Wang, Lucía Caudillo, Mihnea Surdu, Federico Bianchi, Zoé Brasseur, Angela Buchholz, Dexian Chen, Jonathan Duplissy, Xu‐Cheng He, Victoria Hofbauer, Naser G. A. Mahfouz, В. С. Махмутов, Ruby Marten, Bernhard Mentler, Maxim Philippov, Meredith Schervish, Dongyu Wang, Stefan K. Weber, André Welti, Imad El Haddad, Katrianne Lehtipalo, Markku Kulmala, Douglas R. Worsnop, J. Kirkby, Roy L. Mauldin, Dominik Stolzenburg, Siegfried Schobesberger, Richard C. Flagan, Neil M. Donahue, Environmental Science Atmospheres. None(None)] 2025. https://openalex.org/W4412539819
We present a “diagonal” Volatility Basis Set (dVBS) comparing gas-phase concentrations of oxygenated organic molecules (OOM) to their condensed-phase mass fractions. This permits closure of vapor concentrations with particle composition...
item.author: Brandon Lopez, Nirvan Bhattacharyya, Jenna DeVivo, Mingyi Wang, Lucía Caudillo, Mihnea Surdu, Federico Bianchi, Zoé Brasseur, Angela Buchholz, Dexian Chen, Jonathan Duplissy, Xu‐Cheng He, Victoria Hofbauer, Naser G.
